name: Tape on Me
description:
"My owner's life hasn't been great lately.  I am Tape, and I will fix!"

Play as a sentient piece of tape whose owner has been having a rough time! Take to the skies of your owner's apartment and fly around searching for things to stick to and fix. Then see how you've improved their day when they wake up, or find ways to cause chaos and mischief instead...

Explore each nook and cranny for secrets and find all 18 stick-able objects!

//////////////

Content Warning:

This game contains references to alcohol, and the over-the-shoulder point of view could potentially cause feelings of motion sickness, though usually the motion is pretty gentle. 

//////////////

This game was created in collaboration with crazycaryz, Lucid Shiba, guiyyu, and our friend Kevin (who's not on this site) in roughly 48 hours for the 2020 Global Game Jam, with the theme of "Repair." 

These folks are amazing, and their games are really special! Go check out the incredible stuff they're all making and make sure to give them a follow! If you can, consider giving them a donation for some of their games too! Their games are super worth it, and I know that they'll really appreciate the support; it really means a lot and helps them to keep making games!

https://crazycaryz.itch.io/

https://lucid-shiba.itch.io/

https://guiyyu.itch.io/

Have a good flight!
